questions.question: When was the college established?
questions.answer: National College, Bagepalli was established in July 1978.

questions.question: Who founded the college?
questions.answer: The college was founded under Dr. H. Narasimhaiah (Dr. HN).

questions.question: Who manages the college?
questions.answer: It is managed by National Education Society of Karnataka (NES).

questions.question: What inspired the creation of this college?
questions.answer: It was established to promote rural education and academic excellence.

questions.question: Is the college part of a larger institution?
questions.answer: Yes, it operates under NES, which runs multiple institutions.

questions.question: What undergraduate programs are offered?
questions.answer: Programs include BBA, BA, B.Com, B.Sc, and BCA.

questions.question: Is BCA available?
questions.answer: Yes, BCA is available.

questions.question: Does the college offer science programs?
questions.answer: Yes, B.Sc programs are offered.

questions.question: What commerce courses are available?
questions.answer: B.Com and BBA are available.

questions.question: Are arts programs available?
questions.answer: Yes, BA is offered.

questions.question: How many degree programs are offered?
questions.answer: The college offers 7 degree programs.

questions.question: Does it follow semester system?
questions.answer: Yes, the college follows a semester system.

questions.question: How many students are enrolled?
questions.answer: Approximately 1306 students are enrolled.

questions.question: What is the faculty strength?
questions.answer: There are around 33 faculty members.

questions.question: What is the campus size?
questions.answer: The campus covers 7 acres.

questions.question: Is it a co-educational institution?
questions.answer: Yes, it is a co-educational institution.

questions.question: Does the college have a library?
questions.answer: Yes, the library contains over 40,000 books.

questions.question: Does the campus have Wi-Fi?
questions.answer: Yes, Wi-Fi is available.

questions.question: Are computer labs available?
questions.answer: Yes, modern computer labs are available.

questions.question: Is there an auditorium?
questions.answer: Yes, there is a 500 seating capacity auditorium.

questions.question: Is there a cafeteria?
questions.answer: Yes, a hygienic cafeteria is available.

questions.question: Does the college have a placement cell?
questions.answer: Yes, there is a Training and Placement Cell.

questions.question: Are students trained for interviews?
questions.answer: Yes, mock interviews and training sessions are conducted.

questions.question: Are industrial visits organized?
questions.answer: Yes, industrial visits are regularly organized.

questions.question: Are cultural events conducted?
questions.answer: Yes, cultural and academic events are conducted annually.

questions.question: Are NSS programs available?
questions.answer: Yes, NSS programs are available.

questions.question: Is there a student council?
questions.answer: Yes, a student council represents student interests.

questions.question: How can I apply?
questions.answer: You can apply by visiting the college with required documents.

questions.question: When does admission start?
questions.answer: Admissions begin after PUC results are announced.

questions.question: What documents are required for admission?
questions.answer: Marks cards, transfer certificate, ID proof, and photographs are required.

questions.question: Are scholarships available?
questions.answer: Yes, eligible students can apply for government scholarships.

questions.question: Why should I join this college?
questions.answer: The college offers quality education and rural empowerment.

questions.question: Is it good for rural students?
questions.answer: Yes, it was established to support rural students.

questions.question: Is the environment safe?
questions.answer: Yes, the campus is safe and disciplined.
